text: The 2021 Madrid explosion occurred on 20 January 2021, when a natural gas leak caused the explosion of a building located in Madrid, Spain. Four people were killed and eleven were injured. Category:2021 disasters in Europe 2021 explosion Category:Disasters in Spain Category:Explosions in Europe Category:January 2021 events Category:Explosions in 2021 Category:2021 in Spain
title: 2021 Madrid explosion
